results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 08
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around a bedroom, a bathroom and wearing apparel. The grammar dealt with concerns the perfect participle and omission of articles.

results.title: First aid training in personnel damage control. No. 4. Fractures
results.creator_credit: United States. Dept. of the Navy and Wilding Picture Productions
results.brief_description: In this film, instructions are given to sailors on how to give first aid for fractured bones. Animation is used to describe the human skeletal system, the effects of fractures on muscle, blood vessels, skin, and nerves, to illustrate the difference between simple and compound fractures, and to illustrate the effects of a Thomas splint.

results.title: Fra Diavolo
results.creator_credit: Francesco Cancellieri, George Richfield, Official Films and Richfield Operatic Films
results.brief_description: A condensed version of Aubor’s comic opera in three acts. The film preserves the dramatic continuity of the complete opera and includes the major scenes and musical passages. Photographed on the stage of the opera house of Rome, sung in Italian by La Scala Opera Company with Nino Adami in the role of Fra Diavolo.
